name: SPM12 Affine Registration
description: Performs affine registration using SPM12 in a Dockerized MATLAB/Octave environment, saving both the transformed image and the transformation matrix.

inputs.name: Source Image
inputs.description: Path to the source image for registration.

inputs.name: Template Image
inputs.description: Path to the template image for registration.

inputs.name: Output Image Path
inputs.description: Path where the registered image will be saved.

inputs.name: Output Matrix Path
inputs.description: Path where the transformation matrix will be saved as a .mat file.

output-files.name: Transformation Matrix
output-files.description: File containing the transformation matrix in MATLAB .mat format.
